mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEES (EMPLOYEE_ID, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, HIRE_DATE, JOB_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID) VALUES(#{employee_id}, #{last_name}, #{email}, #{hire_date}, #{job_id}, #{department_id})
mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, HIRE_DATE, JOB_ID, SALARY, COMMISSION_PCT, MANAGER_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID FROM EMPLOYEES ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID
